name: Full Day Package
description: My Full Day wedding package includes 8-12 hours of coverage, 500-800 edited hi-res digital image files on USB. With the right to print and distribute, as well as an online gallery with print purchase options. All this comes in a superb Wooden Presentation Box with a selection of 7×5 prints. £1600

name: Half Day Package
description: Eloping or not looking for full day coverage?……not a problem, half days are £850 and include much of the Full Day package, please get in touch with all your awesome details and I can provide more information. Please note that half days are usually for off peak times.

name: Engagement Photoshoots
description: I also offer engagement photoshoots, where I can be a bit more creative in a more relaxed setting. I’ll take 1-2 hours in a location of your choosing to get you used to the camera for your big day. This can be a great way to build a connection with me and ensure your wedding photos go off without a hitch.  £300
